entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers this evening. Showers beginning overnight. Amount 5 mm. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low 6. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Showers. High 10.
entry.summary: Showers ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near noon. Wind becoming southwest 30 in the afternoon. High 10. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 70 percent chance of showers changing to 30 percent chance of showers near midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 21 April 2023
